timeline.message:
Update documentation of reference builds.

In the upcoming release the reference build detection of the Forensic Plugin will be used.
Add permission checks for all list models.
Update package-lock.json with latest version of fsevents.

Update documentation of reference builds.

In the upcoming release the reference build detection of the Forensic Plugin will be used.

Bump version of plugin-utils to 1.6.0.

Use new architecture rule of plugin-utils to check `doFill` methods.
Improve naming of checkboxes. Remove descriptions.

Merge pull request #712 from jenkinsci/checkbox-names

Improve checkbox names

Merge pull request #710 from jenkinsci/post-for-doFill

Security harding for UI model methods

Merge pull request #713 from jenkinsci/imgbot

[ImgBot] Optimize images

Bump codecov/codecov-action from v1.0.15 to v1.1.0

Bumps [codecov/codecov-action](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action) from v1.0.15 to v1.1.0.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action/compare/v1.0.15...7de43a7373de21874ae196a78f8eb633fcf7f0c4)

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

Merge pull request #715 from jenkinsci/dependabot/github_actions/codecov/codecov-action-v1.1.0

Bump codecov/codecov-action from v1.0.15 to v1.1.0

Bump xmlunit-assertj from 2.8.1 to 2.8.2

Bumps [xmlunit-assertj](https://github.com/xmlunit/xmlunit) from 2.8.1 to 2.8.2.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/xmlunit/xmlunit/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/xmlunit/xmlunit/blob/main/RELEASE_NOTES.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/xmlunit/xmlunit/compare/v2.8.1...v2.8.2)

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

Bump codecov/codecov-action from v1.1.0 to v1.1.1

Bumps [codecov/codecov-action](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action) from v1.1.0 to v1.1.1.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/codecov/codecov-action/compare/v1.1.0...1fc7722ded4708880a5aea49f2bfafb9336f0c8d)

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

Also check for permissions in `check` methods.

Downstream PR for https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-util-api-plugin/pull/68.

Merge pull request #718 from jenkinsci/dependabot/github_actions/codecov/codecov-action-v1.1.1

Bump codecov/codecov-action from v1.1.0 to v1.1.1

Merge pull request #717 from jenkinsci/dependabot/maven/org.xmlunit-xmlunit-assertj-2.8.2

Bump xmlunit-assertj from 2.8.1 to 2.8.2
Fix test due to added security.

Merge pull request #719 from jenkinsci/add-permission-for-check-methods

Also check for permissions in `check` methods

Fix checkbox titles.

Move title from entry to checkbox, otherwise Jenkins 2.243.x shows titles at wrong place.

Adapt UI tests with `skipBlames` property.

- Removed `skipForensics` property.
- Removed `referenceJob` property.
- Add `skipBlames` property in freestyle jobs.

Fix trend chart tests.

Add assertions and wait for the next trend chart right after each click.

Check for permissions in all `check` methods.

Downstream PR for https://github.com/jenkinsci/plugin-util-api-plugin/pull/68.
Pass around checksInfo, not checksName; support recordIssues

Bump release-drafter/release-drafter from v5.12.1 to v5.13.0

Bumps [release-drafter/release-drafter](https://github.com/release-drafter/release-drafter) from v5.12.1 to v5.13.0.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/release-drafter/release-drafter/releases)
- [Commits](https://github.com/release-drafter/release-drafter/compare/v5.12.1...4d1215c66d92eba9557a55da848b2281a1a19235)

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

Merge pull request #723 from jenkinsci/dependabot/github_actions/release-drafter/release-drafter-v5.13.0

Bump release-drafter/release-drafter from v5.12.1 to v5.13.0
Add option to publishing all or new issues.

Merge pull request #721 from mrginglymus/with-checks

Support `withChecks`, see https://github.com/jenkinsci/checks-api-plugin/pull/49.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into checks-refresh-ui

# Conflicts:
#	plugin/src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/steps/IssuesRecorder.java
#	plugin/src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/steps/PublishIssuesStep.java
#	plugin/src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/steps/WarningChecksPublisher.java
#	plugin/src/test/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/steps/WarningChecksPublisherITest.java

Add missing properties for `recordIssues` step.

Also add an integration test that verifies the step.

Merge pull request #724 from jenkinsci/checks-refresh-ui

Improve layout of checks markup
Bump version of forensics API plugin to 0.8.0.
Update release script to use minor version as next one.
checkstyle: First sentence should end with a period.
bind to released version of analysis-model(-api)

timeline.bodyText: Since this is the URL to the results, a shorter name is preferable, like trivy.
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.bodyText: Symbol is missing, trivy would be a good name
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.bodyText: From the website it looks like there is an icon available. Does it have an oss license so we can include it here?
timeline.author: uhafner

replies.bodyText: trivy is available under Apache Common 2.0 license. I do not know if the logo has an additional license or trademark.
replies.author: tofuatjava

replies.bodyText: have resized the logo to 48x48 and 24x24. I'm not sure if it is too pixelated now
replies.author: tofuatjava

timeline.bodyText: This will deactivate copying of the affected files, is this intended?
timeline.author: uhafner

replies.bodyText: there are no affected files, because the scan is done in a temporary image based on the original image. however, in my opinion it makes no sense to copy affected files anywhere.
replies.author: tofuatjava

timeline.bodyText: I think wrapping in {@code and <pre> would look better
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add a small test to https://github.com/jenkinsci/warnings-ng-plugin/blob/master/plugin/src/test/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/warnings/steps/ParsersITest.java
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.bodyText:
This is a short label for the URL, what about Trivy?
It should be part of the file Messages.properties.
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.bodyText: The next time it would be helpful if you can create the PR in a branch of your fork. Otherwise the PR contains a lot of unrelated changes, hard to review.
timeline.author: uhafner

timeline.message:
adding licensing information about trivy icons and improve based on
suggestion in the review
